document.full_text: israel deployed a long-anticipated rocket shield outside the gaza strip on sunday but cautioned israelis under fire from the hamas-run territory that they would not be completely protected.
document.title: israel deploys first anti-rocket system near gaza
lines_and_colors: israel deployed a long-anticipated rocket shield outside the gaza strip on sunday but cautioned israelis under fire from the hamas-run territory that they would not be completely protected.
